alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:47AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Garfield, southeastern Holt and Wheeler Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 546 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of O`Neill to 8 miles northwest of Ericson. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ewing, Chambers, Page, Bartlett, Ericson, Inman, Knievels Corner, Buffalo Flats, Sunfish Lake, Cumminsville, Four Corners, Pibel Lake State Recreation Area, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Gables. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 312 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
